content.question: In the twelfth paragraph (“Wish . . . stamp”), the narrator likens the old man’s face to an “old stamp” in order to emphasize the

choices.label: effect that long exposure to the elements has had on his appearance
value that his many years of experience bring to the community
importance of the message he delivers to Vera and Mrs. Chandler
similarity of his face to the faces of other men his age

content.answer: effect that long exposure to the elements has had on his appearance

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
